function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased inequality and lack of diversity among service organizations due to covid-19 constraints.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overcrowding in service venues","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of trust and confidence in service venues","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear and inconsistent social distancing rules and laws","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement of social distancing rules","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for respiratory droplet transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in managing human interactions in service venues","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in demand for delivery services due to the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective vaccine for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards new normal of social distancing and shelter at home","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uber’s policy of inclusiveness and sharing of information may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shelter at home policies and social distancing challenges have impacted uber’s business model, potentially contributing to the spread of contagion as people seek alternative transportation options.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vanishing demand due to shelter at home policies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"People staying home and consuming digital content","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial institutions offering educational classes in basic financial literacy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"E-commerce stock outs of essential items like hand sanitizer","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Price gouging by unscrupulous sellers during a pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Highly variable nature of online customer demand","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Medium contact intensity in grocery stores and restaurants","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Online communities and services in gymnasiums","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High contact services operating during a total lockdown","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of online communities for hair salons","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Small family-run businesses without resources to develop online presence","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High degree of physical interaction required for service delivery","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of defined laws and regulations surrounding the spread of covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in transitioning services online","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High degree of interactivity in service delivery","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Online service delivery with no physical interaction","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proactive signals are costly, leading some firms to choose not to adopt an accommodative posture.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inertial pressures to conform to laws, regulations, and decrees imposed by local and state governments.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deliberate communication strategies using accommodative signals are necessary, even if costly.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Firms resisting the use of accommodative signals in communication","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Information asymmetry in pandemic situations can hinder effective communication and response","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Different frames of reference for the cause of the pandemic leading to differential influences on beliefs and attitudes","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective response to natural disasters due to lack of resilience","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Racial stereotypes perpetuated by covid medical studies influencing brand decisions.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks of mishandling past depictions of slavery in media and entertainment.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Theorizing and human connectedness in pandemic research impacting societal trust and organizational resilience.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 transmission through close contact","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Theorizing and rebranding without successful implementation","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid turnover of untested ideas leading to fads","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease transmission in dense urban areas due to increased customer footfall in pickup locations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contagion in restaurants due to high customer turnover and close proximity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination and transmission of diseases through food delivery and pickup services","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conflicting and minute guidelines from governments and chain owners creating challenges for food restaurant franchisees in implementing covid-19 reopening protocols.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proactive adoption of drive-in screening options by cinema theatres in response to covid-19 regulatory constraints.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to social distancing regulations in institutional environments","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provision of free masks by hair salons without adherence to health and safety regulations","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Theorizing and significant investment in brand meaning without clear economic justification","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conformity to rules and norms may stifle innovation and growth.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"}]}
